content.raw:
We are using a separate .mex file for each function; that seems to be the norm for this kind of extension to MATLAB.  Our .c code that gets compiled into .mex is [here](#!/osrf/haptix-comm/src/default/matlab/?at=default).  So far we've only wrapped `hx_getdeviceinfo()` and `hx_update()`, because that all that we strictly need; we'll wrap the others once the API is settled.

As for how the underlying state (e.g., sockets) is managed: @caguero, can you comment on that?
